sub_title: Project Executive, globally experienced in developing and implementing large scale and highly complex facilities
summary:
As Project Executive in the global Energy Industry, I have gained deep insights in strategic and complex project development, design, large construction, economics, environmental preservation and energy transition.
I am passionate to leverage my industry experience for the purpose of adding value for customers and delivering high quality projects.
As a leader I have been characterized as trustworthy, diplomatic, a natural integrator and bridge builder, inspiring new generations of leaders and empowering teams to achieve results. My leadership strengths include achievement and delivery focus, power of analysis, team builder, motivator, integrator, resilience, relationship and customer focus across interfaces.
